headline: Leadership Shift And Robust 2025 Results Could Be A Game Changer For Amphenol (APH)
summary: In late January 2026, Amphenol reported full-year 2025 results showing US$23.09 billion in sales and US$4.27 billion in net income, issued first-quarter 2026 sales guidance of US$6.90–US$7.00 billion, continued share repurchases, and in early February affirmed a US$0.25 per share first-quarter 2026 dividend. The Board’s decision to combine the Chairman and CEO roles in 2026 while maintaining a Lead Independent Director highlights a carefully structured leadership transition alongside the...
